payload.text: To be transferred to a new adviser, please speak to your new adviser who must request for you to be transferred under their advice.
To transfer existing Panorama client(s) to be under your advice, a 'Transfer between advisers' form needs to be completed. To access this form, please select the 'Open form' button.
To better help you with your query please log into your account and ask me again
This query does not apply to this account type. Is there anything else I can help you with?
